Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets defeated the Washington Nationals 10-1 in the previous game.
The Washington Nationals had runners on first and third with no outs in the third inning but scored only one run.
The Nationals' offense struggled as they were 0-for-5 with runners in scoring position.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is part of a three-game series between the Washington Nationals and the New York Mets.
The Nationals will travel to Chicago to face the Chicago Cubs for a four-game series after this game.
DJ Herz will start for the Washington Nationals, while Jose Quintana will start for the New York Mets.
